org.grouplens.lenskit.specs

Interface Specifiable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataSource, TTDataSet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataSource, GenericDataSource, GenericTTDataSet, PackedDataSource, PreferenceDomain, TextDataSource

    public interface Specifiable
    Interface allowing an object to produce a specification to recreate itself.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> toSpecification(SpecificationContext context)
      Create a specification for this object.

    • Method Detail

      • toSpecification

        @Nonnull
java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> toSpecification(SpecificationContext context)
        Create a specification for this object. The return value should be a JSON-like structure, such that wrapping it in ConfigFactory.parseMap(java.util.Map) and passing it to SpecificationContext.build(Class, com.typesafe.config.Config) will result in an equivalent object.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for generating the specification.
        Returns:
        A specification for this object.
